allow: Bash(cmd /c "echo off && set ADB_PATH=%LOCALAPPDATA%\Android\Sdk\platform-tools\adb.exe && echo Checking log directories on robot... && echo. && echo === PsiKit Logs (Our CSV logs): === && %ADB_PATH% shell ls -lh /sdcard/FIRST/PsiKitLogs/ 2>&1 && echo. && echo === RoadRunner Logs (Old, different format): === && %ADB_PATH% shell ls -lh /storage/emulated/0/RoadRunner/logs/ 2>&1")
